import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Cart = ({ cartItems, removeFromCart }) => { const [storedCartItems, setStoredCartItems] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { const savedCartItems = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cartItems')) || [] setStoredCartItems(savedCartItems) console.log('Loaded Cart Items from LocalStorage:', savedCartItems) // Debugging to check loading from localStorage }, []) const totalPrice = storedCartItems.reduce((total, item) => total + item.price, 0) const handleRemoveFromCart = (itemToRemove) => { const updatedCartItems = storedCartItems.filter((item) => item.customId !== itemToRemove.customId) setStoredCartItems(updatedCartItems) localStorage.setItem('cartItems', JSON.stringify(updatedCartItems)) // Update localStorage console.log('Updated Cart after Removal:', updatedCartItems) // Debugging to check if removal works removeFromCart(itemToRemove) // Optional callback to handle cart state elsewhere } return (
{storedCartItems.length > 0 ? ( <>
{storedCartItems.map((item, index) => (
{item.foodName}
{item.foodRestaurant}
â‚¹{item.price.toFixed(2)}
handleRemoveFromCart(item)}>
))}
Total Price: â‚¹{totalPrice.toFixed(2)}
) : (
No items in the cart
Add Items
Scroll like a{' '} foodie
)}
) } export default Cart
